alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Iowa; Jefferson; Lafayette; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:11PM CDT until March 31 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Green County in south central Wisconsin... Eastern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Horeb to near Monroe to Dakota, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Janesville, Beloit, Fitchburg, Middleton, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Monroe, Verona, Oregon, Jefferson, South Beloit, McFarland, Monona, Mount Horeb, Lake Mills, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, and Dodgeville. This includes the following Locations York Memorial Church, Wisconsin State Capitol, Hyde`s Mill, and The House on the Rock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Dane; Green; Iowa; Jefferson; Lafayette; Rock
